Well, ive been playing ksp for about... 5 months or so, but created this account closer, and i never did post a "welcome aboard" post. So, HI!

Btw, Where have you been to? (planets)

me:

Kerbin

Duna (no returning)

Eve manned crashing, unmanned landing

Ike flyby

Minimus

Mun

Jool orbit

Unmanned Tylo landing!

Jool flyby

So yeah, ive been doing stuff.

Hi The Destroyer, welcome to the community
